name: Woodland Chasers
description:
By BladeGrip Studio

Fly through the woods, avoiding obstacles and chaser attacks along the way. Fight off the chasers, and complete your journey to subdue the snow avatar.

Woodland Chasers is a 2D autoscroller game. It is the first of many Woodland series of games expected to come in the future.

Features:

  • Mouse-only controls. Only left click and right click are needed.
  • Three elements of your choosing to fight off the chasers
  • Skill trees to upgrade your character
  • Achievements giving permanent stat boosts, coins to spend at shop, and pretty pictures
  • Cute characters 
  • Funny short comics
